entry.title: WYDEN SPONSORS RESOLUTION UNDERSCORING ROLE OF LOCAL NEWS

entry.title: MERKLEY,PAUL US STRIKES ON YEMEN UNDERMINE LAW
entry.summary: April 3, 2025 2:50 a.m. On Tuesday, in response to escalating U.S. military strikes against Houthi rebels in Yemen, Oregon’s U.S. Senator Jeff Merkley and Kentucky’s U.S. Senator Rand Paul joined forces to urge the Trump administration to adhere to the Constitution and consult with Congress in order to avoid stumbling into another costly and...
